item.description: Update #PenroseFire #MediaAdvisory Major Emergency Fire; INC#1522; 09:05PM; 11200 W Penrose St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VeIKar; #SunValley; Media are asked to meet LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter *now* at media staging: Penrose Street and Bradley Avenue; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 BC10 BC11 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 BP19 BP74 CM40 CM42 E13 E16 E18 E20 E21 E221 E239 E24 E25 E260 E274 E289 E29 E290 E295 E298 E3 E33 E39 E61 E63 E66 E7 E77 E86 E88 E89 E90 E94 E98 EA1 EM14 H1 H5 H6 HA1 HA5 HA6 HE2 PI3 RA77 RS3 T21 T39 T60 T74 T89 T90 T95 T98 WT77 + Burbank FD + Glendale FD; CH8; 13 14 17; Brian Humphrey

Update #PenroseFire Major Emergency Fire; INC#1522; 08:56PM; 11200 W Penrose St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VeIKar; #SunValley; Now 165 LAFD Firefighters assigned by ground and air, assisted by units from the neighboring Burbank and Glendale FD's continue in defensive operations against wind-driven fire involving vegetation and heavily damaging a 75' x 300' one-story metal clad building. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is on scene.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 BC10 BC11 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 BP19 BP74 CM40 CM42 E13 E16 E18 E20 E21 E221 E239 E24 E25 E260 E274 E289 E29 E290 E295 E298 E3 E33 E39 E61 E63 E66 E7 E77 E86 E88 E89 E90 E94 E98 EM14 H1 H5 H6 HA1 HA5 HA6 HE2 PI3 RA77 RS3 T21 T39 T60 T74 T89 T90 T95 T98 WT77 + Burbank FD + Glendale FD; CH8; 13 14 17; Brian Humphrey

Update #PenroseFire Major Emergency Fire; INC#1522; 08:23PM; 11200 W Penrose St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VeIKar; #SunValley; With 111 LAFD Firefighters assigned by ground and air, this incident, known as the "Penrose Fire". has escalated to Major Emergency status. The wind-driven fire involving grass, trees and other vegetation had already extended into a 75' x 300' one-story metal clad building on LAFD arrival. LAFD has asked CHP to close both north and southbound lanes of the Golden State (I-5) Freeway between the Hollywood (SR170) Freeway and Sunland Boulevard until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. CHP Altadena Log #2715.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E21 E24 E260 E274 E289 E29 E290 E298 E3 E33 E61 E66 E7 E77 E86 E88 E89 E90 E98 EM14 H1 H5 H6 HA1 HA5 HA6 RA77 T60 T74 T89 T90 T98 WT77; CH8; 13 14 17; Brian Humphrey

Fire; INC#1522; 07:39PM; 11200 W Penrose St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VeIKar; #SunValley; PRELIM: Vegetation Fire adjacent to the Golden State Freeway appears to have extended to involve an adjacent 50' x 300' one-story metal clad commercial building.,; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E21 E260 E289 E3 E66 E77 E89 E90 EM14 H0A H0E T60 T89 WT77; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Structure Fire - Now Out 11/18/2022 INC#1710

item.description: Update Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1710; 09:15PM; 18616 W Topham St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GsJg06; #Tarzana; On further assessment, there were *eight* tiny homes at a transitional housing center affected by the fire, the one unit initially involved with fire, and seven others that sustained heat and fire damage. There have been no injuries. Fire cause remains under investigation.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E273 E288 E293 E73 RA73 RA93 T73 T88 T93; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1710; 08:51PM; 18616 W Topham St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GsJg06; #Tarzana; PRELIM: LAFD arrived to find 4 "tiny homes" at transitional housing center ablaze, and others threatened. First arriving firefighters took just 17 minutes (9:08 PM) to fully extinguish flames, preventing fire from extending beyond the 4 involved units. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E273 E288 E293 E73 RA73 RA93 T73 T88 T93; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Natural Gas Leak; INC#1244; 03:58PM; 1031 Downey Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EJmkbD; #UniversityPark; PRELIM: LAFD supporting SoCalGas crews addressing a natural gas leak at a construction site on the USC Campus, from an approximately 8" pipeline that was reportedly ruptured during construction. No fire. No injury. The immediate area of the leak has been isolated and an unknown number of persons have been calmly evacuated from two buildings as a precaution. Media Inquiries: USC Public Safety, USC Administration, SoCalGas; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; E215 T15; CH7; - Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#2038; 12:19AM; 649 N Spring St - Spring Ic; MAP: https://bit.ly/3geO0fj; Chinatown; KNOCKDOWN: After knocking down the bulk of the fire with master streams, the incident returned to the offensive mode. Firefighters made entry to attack the remaining fire which was out of reach and fully extinguished the fire in 45 mins. They defended the exposed 3 story building from damage. A search of the building was clear and no injuries were reported. No further details.; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 EA1 EM11 RA3 RA4 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#2038; 11:34PM; 649 N Spring St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3geO0fj; Chinatown; Two story, vacant commercial building with fire showing. Firefighters were initially in the offensive mode and are transitioning to the defensive mode. Crews are deploying ladder pipes and large diameter hand lines. ; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E203 E209 E210 E3 E4 EM11 RA4 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
